fields.title: Python developer
fields.description:
One time project basically refactoring the existing code base.
- The main job was parsing and extracting PDF files and indexing essential data into elastic search.

fields.title: Django Developer
fields.description:
Building an automated error monitoring website, to track all the errors related to electronic devices, and generating automated error reports based on the monitored errors.
- This project included application interface managed by only administrator.

fields.title: Django Developer
fields.description:
A one time project I've built (later I worked as a project supporter and maintainer) is an advertising website.
- It includes some premium and VIP packages so including a payment gateway and a bunch of background tasks using celery.
